name: catalog

enums.name: adjustment_type
enums.description: Cost variation used to calculate localized prices

unions.name: expandable_function
unions.description: A function can be represented with just it's ID, or the entire model

unions.name: expandable_subcatalog
unions.description: A subcatalog can be represented with just it's ID, or the entire model

models.name: flow

fields.name: origin
fields.description: The country of origin as a iso_4217_3 currency code. See http://reference.api.flow.io/countries

models.description: Flow internal model containing an item's origin and classified harmonization code (6 digit)

models.name: function
models.description: Prioritized calculation yielding a localized price (also allows for custom defined price function)

models.name: item

fields.name: currency
fields.description: iso_4217_3 currency code as defined in http://reference.api.flow.io/currencies

models.description: The Flow item defines a specific item that can be purchased by a consumer. For many clients, this will map to a Sku.

models.name: item_form

fields.name: locale
fields.description: The locale in which the content of this item is written.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The customer friendly name of the actual item in the catalog.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: iso_4217_3 currency code as defined in http://reference.api.flow.io/currencies

fields.name: price
fields.description: The actual price of the item as offered to a customer. This price must be in the currency specified for this item.

fields.name: categories
fields.description: A list of categories associated with this item.

fields.name: description
fields.description: If provided, the item description is used to improve classification.

fields.name: attributes
fields.description: Attributes represent all other product data that you have regarding this item. Common attributes include 'country_of_origin', 'color', 'size', 'material', etc. We recommend including as many attributes as possible.

fields.name: dimensions
fields.description: If provided, dimensions are used to drive more accurate shipping estimates.

fields.name: images
fields.description: If provided, the item images will be used to enhance the user experience in Flow's online tools.

models.description: The item form defines the data required to create an item.

models.name: presets
models.description: Presentation for UI that is used to generate a localized price function

models.name: subcatalog
models.description: A configuration with custom query to select a subset of master catalog items for a localized experience

fields.name: key
fields.description: If not provided, key will be set to the country code of the provided countries (i.e. cad-fra).

operations.description: Returns information about a specific catalog.
Provides visibility into recent changes of each object, including deletion
Search functions. Always paginated.
Returns information about a specific function.
Add function
Update function with the specified id, creating if it does not exist.
Delete the function with this id

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter to items with any one of these numbers.

operations.description: Provides visibility into recent changes of each object, including deletion

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Find items with this number. Case insensitive. Exact match

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query against Algolia for items (i.e. give me all apparel)

operations.description: Search items. Always paginated.
Returns information about a specific item.
Add catalog item(s)
Update item with the specified id, creating if it does not exist.
Delete the item with this id
Provides visibility into recent changes of each object, including deletion
Search subcatalogs. Always paginated.
Returns information about a specific subcatalog.
Add subcatalog
Update subcatalog with the specified id, creating if it does not exist.
Delete the subcatalog with this id
Returns information about a specific subcatalog's settings.
Update subcatalog settings for the specified subcatalog.
Sync subcatalog

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter to items with any one of these numbers.

operations.description: Provides visibility into recent changes of each object, including deletion
Search subcatalog items. Always paginated.
Returns information about specific subcatalog items.
Add subcatalog item
Update subcatalog item with the specified id, creating if it does not exist.
Delete the subcatalog item with this id

description: API to the product catalog, defining the master catalog and all of the subcatalogs used to target specific subsets of the inventory to experiences.
